name: MARATAKA
description:
Description

You lived a happy life on an island in the middle of an ocean, but one day everything has changed. One of the eldest gods MARATAKA woke up after thousands of years and what he saw, was the village of godless people. You are the only one that can stop the God from wiping whole life from entire island. It won’t be easy, but you already know that to survive, sacrifices must be made!

There are 5 possible endings of the game. Unfortunatly we didn’t mannage to add cutscenes for them 😢 Share the ones that you’ve discovered in comments. Good luck! 😃

Controls

wasd - movement

space - jump

mouse - looking

RMB - draw/hide weapon

LMB - (with weapon) attack

LMB - (without weapon) pick/throw

Used tools

Unity

Blender

Magica Voxel

Krita

Gimp

Audacity
